bibl.title: Letter from June Rose to Philip Showalter Hench, February 7, 1942

div1.p: June Rose, Wallace Forbes' niece, thanks Hench for the candy and wishes him success with his book.

div1.head: Letter from June Rose to Philip Showalter Hench, February 7, 1942
div1.p:
My grandmother and I received your
lovely box of candy, and I wish to express
the pleasure that your thoughtfulness has
given a very old lady.

I imagine our help was negligible,
but we are certainly enthused about the work
you are doing and hope to hear further
from you when your book is more advanced.
